import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List deployment history"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/sites/deployments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the deployment history for the current site, showing all software version releases applied to the tenant environment.

**Use Cases**
- Track when new features and fixes were deployed to your district
- Audit version history for compliance or troubleshooting
- Verify which release is currently active in Production or Testing environments

**Response Fields**
- `Version` - Semantic version string (e.g., "25.11.0")
- `DeployedDate` - Timestamp when the deployment was applied
- `Environment` - Target environment (Production, Staging, Testing)
- `ReleaseNotes` - Summary description of the release

**Notes**: Results are returned in reverse chronological order with the most recent deployment first.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
